name: FNF Rainbow Friends Test
description:
It's Rainbow Friends from Week "Blue and Green" from Friday Night Funkin' Vs. Rainbow Friends! Credits do really go to Mewza and team for making the Friday Night Funkin' Vs. Rainbow Friends mod :) ! Play on the web here on a PC/Mobile devices! If you want, if you have a windows computer, you can also download it with the download button below!

Controls: 

To switch to touch control, touch the toggle in game.

Arrow keys to play the sounds (For mobile press D-pad button) 

Hold space and press any other arrow key for secondary sound (For mobile A Button and D-pad button)

Hope you enjoyed!  ;)

Hold any of the buttons to hold a pose!

Check out the Friday Night Funkin here: https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin

Also check out Friday Night Funkin on Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/770371

Check out the original Friday Night Funkin' Vs. Rainbow Friends mod: https://gamebanana.com/wips/69823
